key_findings: Daily Wage Calculation serves as primary configuration point with 3 distinct services
Configuration hierarchy enforced through disabled fields in dependent features
Clear override indicators (alerts, messages, links) guide users to primary config
Consistent UI patterns across all affected features (Payroll, EOS, Leaves)
All disabled fields display values from global configuration
Navigation links provide direct access to Daily Wage Calculation settings
Blue informational alerts explain automated payroll integration
Formula display maintains readability: Component / Calculation = Days
ui_patterns_observed: Hyperlinks with 'opens in new tab' indicators
technical_notes: Decimal precision supported in Custom days (e.g., 30.45)
Three calculation base options: Working days, Calendar days, Custom days
Direct URL navigation with anchor tags (#daily-wage)
Configuration values cascade from Payroll > Daily Wage Calculation to all dependent features
Leave policy shows 362 employees affected, demonstrating production use
Warning message prevents editing when employees assigned to policy
